about_the_game:
The "Path of the Midnight Sun" Original Soundtrack is a captivating, three-hour musical journey that embodies the emotions, desires, and aspirations of the protagonists as they traverse the enchanting world of Arvium. This immersive soundtrack will accompany and elevate your gaming experience, culminating in a breathtaking orchestral crescendo.

All tracks have been composed by Andrea Caranfil.
